title: Holy Flat
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: Holy Flat! is a vegetarian restaurant serving made-in-house vegetarian and vegan flatbreads and bowls. Flatbreads are organic, baked-to-order and filled with a good selection of ingredients. Also has a variety of organic drinks and juices as well as organic chocolate.
